title: Olympic champion brothers Shaolin and Shaoang Liu on defending their short track title
description:
It's not often that you share an Olympic title win with your brother. Hungary's Shaolin and Shaoang Liu took gold in the men's 5,000m relay in short track speed skating back at PyeongChang 2018. Marina Dmukhovskaya spoke to them about Beijing 2022, their hopes of finding some local Chinese support at the Olympics, and Shaolin's infamous eyebrow / wink camera trick.


Interview: https://olympics.com/en/news/short-track-stars-shaolin-and-shaoang-liu-interview

Top five things to know: https://olympics.com/en/news/olympic-short-track-speed-skating-at-beijing-2022-top-five-things-to-know
